review: Works well with Google Chrome web browser.
author: Waggs3228

review: This thing couldn't be more buggy if they tried. Regularly loses connection, lags during screen casting, takes several seconds to respond to volume changes. I'm using it on a 40Mbps network with brand new phones all in close proximity. WORTHLESS.
author: Xpress Computer Solutions

review: 4 Stars for doing what it said it would do.  In order to achieve 5 stars, it must be able to stream Amazon Prime and home network integration would be a nice touch as well.
author: Carsten M.

review: Works very well with all my devices. Use it as a travel companion for all my trips.
author: STYT

review: it doesn't have amazon prime videoI tried google's suggested solution for that by using google chorome browser and the voice was late from the picture.
